shortdesc.p: Want to know about internships? Click here.
Need help with applying for an internship? Click here for all of the information you need.
Applying for an internship can be a daunting task, but there are steps you can take to ensure that you are fully prepared.
The first step to getting an internship is beginning the process. This page will show you exactly how to do so.
If you feel as though you need outside help, you can meet with an advisor to help guide the way. Your advisor can also help you choose internships that best fit your needs.

topic.title: How to Refer to Career Services

shortdesc.p: Career Services is an excellent resource to use to find internships that are perfect for you.
Anyone is eligible for an internship, however internship eligibility varies by employer. Some employers offer internships to students who are freshmen, while others require a higher academic level.

topic.title: How to Apply for an Internship for College Credit

shortdesc.p: Apply for an internship to receive college credit
Don't need Virginia Tech class credit for your internship?

This guide is for all Virginia Tech students interested in obtaining an internship for compensation, rather than credit. This includes undergraduates (freshman through seniors) and graduate students of all majors seeking internship experience during college.

Many employers pay their interns. Every major has a different internship pay scale standard based on the field and experience level. In addition to wages, many employers add benefits to their internship compensation packets such as relocation assistance like a housing stipend.
If you have any questions about internships, contact information can be found here.

Internships are one of many ways to get experience during college, and there are many locations to find internships. While some outlets can be found through Virginia Tech, there are also many other locations that offer internship opportunities. There are many types of internship experiences, including field study, part-time, volunteering, shadowing and much more.
